text: East Ryegate is an unincorporated village in the town of Ryegate, Caledonia County, Vermont, United States. The community is located along the Connecticut River and U.S. Route 5 south of St. Johnsbury. East Ryegate has a post office with ZIP code 05042. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Caledonia County, Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont
title: East Ryegate, Vermont
